name: WaterBarrels
title: Waste Water Barreling
author: tehroach
description:
Adds the barrelling of waste water and gas from Angel's, Bob's & NE MODs

 And allows for configurable stack sizes of ores/plates, as I found that the default stack sizes used, kind of defeated the purpose for multi-wagon Trains

However you can completely disable this feature in the config if you want to keep the default stack sizes, but want the extra barrels
